2748-2790  fenced_code_ts            ```ts\nconst example = 'embedded code';\n```
2748-2753  code_fence                ```ts
2753-2787  lang_ts                   \nconst example = 'embedded code';\n
2754-2759  keyword                   const
2768-2769  operator                  =

2785-2786  punctuation               ;
